thought: To craft a smooth_stone_slab, I need to first smelt a cobblestone into a stone, then craft three smooth_stones, and finally craft six smooth_stone_slabs. The first step is to smelt a cobblestone into a stone, so I will smelt the cobblestone from slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 11 with quantity 1
